entry.title: Example
entry.content:
Heading

Sub-heading

Paragraphs are separated
by a blank line.

Two spaces at the end of a line
produces a line break.

Text attributes italic,
bold, monospace.

Horizontal rule:

Strikethrough:
strikethrough

Bullet list:

  • apples
  • oranges
  • pears

Numbered list:

  1. lather
  2. rinse
  3. repeat

An example.

Markdown uses email-style
characters for blockquoting.

Inline HTML is supported.

entry.title: About
entry.content:
Welcome to my blog! 🤝

🏠 About this site

This is a blog that records my life and study

👨‍💻 Who is the blogger

I am Fan, a Chinese student living in New Zealand, majoring in computer science

⛹ Hobbies

I like photography, travel, and playing pc games

📬 Contact me

Email me if you have any questions:
shishunfan@gmail.com
